name: MEPXY Brush Markers - Single Marker - 200 Colours on sale
description:
Mepxy Inks are translucent which permits drawings being colored to show through in detail. You can layer different colors or blend layered colors for 3D effects and subtle shadowing. Double ended illustration markers are available in two versions.

This Marker has a remarkable brush tip which actually feels
like a paint brush, has a chisel tip on the other end.

rrp $7.50

name: MANGA
description: A Selection of Current and Classic popular Manga

name: Home Brew Vampire Bullets Issue #0 Limited Edition
description: In the tradition of Alan Moore's Dodgem Logic, Tales from the Crypt, 2000AD, Oz Magazine and Metal Hurlant... Home Brew Vampire Bullets is an anthology of 75% R-rated (but not necessarily adult), uniquely Aussie myth spinning, prose, politics and pulp soundtracked by Rose Tatts, soaked in Melbourne Bitter and dyed defiantly navy blue. This very limited Editon #0 is 60 full colour pages of pure Ozploitation and features art and stories by 18 of Australia's most infamous comic creators. Each book is Signed and Numbered. Check out HBVB on facebook: https://www.facebook.com/homebrewvampirebullets

name: HALO CERTIFICATION COMIC  BOOK GRADING & ENCAPSULATION
description:
HALO CERTIFICATION are a Professional Australian based Comic and Collectable grading company founded by Grant Adey.

HALO uses sheets of acid free archival paper between front and back covers then seals the book in a mylar patented closure bag which is then placed in a Perspex case and sealed. Each HALO certified book has an information section containing the book grade, details and a unique serial number to identify it which can be checked at their office, grading notes are also available on request. 

Grant On the Process:

Each comic is graded by 3 professional graders, new issues are by 2 senior graders, I have 12 professional graders on call, my untouchables. They never know whose books they grade, the grading is accurate and consistent. We use the Overstreet grading guide as our manual with no exceptions or variations.

Halo Certification also does magazines, photo’s, toys, vintage gaming, currency, stamps, posters, sports. Contact for more info.

COST:

SILVER, BRONZE AND MODERN AGE - $59.95
GOLDEN AGE - $69.95

NOTE:
If you're dropping off and picking up from store please use the code: PICKUP at checkout to reduce the postage.

name: CABLE & DEADPOOL RUN #1-27,33,34
description:
A run of the Marvel comics popular CABLE & DEADPOOL title from 2004 including Issues #1-27,33 & 34. Books range from Fine to Near Mint with an average being Very Fine.
 
PLEASE NOTE: 

I ONLY CHARGE ACTUAL POSTAGE PLUS PACKING MATERIALS.
 
I'M HAPPY TO COMBINE POSTAGE BUT ONLY FOR ITEMS WITHIN 14 DAYS OF EACH OTHER UNLESS OTHERWISE ARRANGED.
 
INTERNATIONAL BIDDERS PLEASE MESSAGE ME FOR A QUOTE BEFORE BIDDING.

I AM NOT AN EXPERT COMIC GRADER. 

ALL COMICS/TPBS ARE GOOD CONDITION UNLESS OTHERWISE STATED. 

WHERE POSSIBLE I LIST ANY OBVIOUS DEFECTS/DAMAGE BUT AM NOT ABLE TO CHECK EVERY PAGE SO IF MINOR PRINT DEFECTS BOTHER YOU PLEASE DO NOT BID.

AT URBAN FICTION WE PRIDE OURSELVES ON CUSTOMER SERVICE. IF YOU HAVE ANY PROBLEMS, 
QUESTIONS OR PLEASE CONTACT ME AND I WILL TRY MY BEST 
TO REMEDY THE SITUATION.

name: DAISY KUTTER: THE LAST TRAIN - TPB COMIC BOOK SET OF 4 - RARE
description:
First Printing 2004.  These quality SOFTCOVER books from VIPER COMICS are in good condition with only some minor wear on the spines and corners (see pics). This is a hard to find complete set of 4 books Written and Illustrated by Kazu Kibuishi.

Daisy Kutter is a retired bank robber and legendary gunfighter who has decided to open a dry goods store in the small town of Middleton. The sheriff, her ex-boyfriend Tom McKay, tries to recruit her to join him on the other side of the law, but she isn't quite ready to move on.

When Daisy loses everything she owns in a high-stakes poker tournament, she is offered a job from the stranger who cleans her out at the table.  He wants to hire her to rob his train.  What's the catch?  He believes his vaunted robotic security system will stop Daisy in her tracks, and he wants to prove it. If she succeeds in robbing the train, she can keep the gold and have her life back...

 PLEASE NOTE:

I'M HAPPY TO COMBINE POSTAGE BUT ONLY FOR ITEMS WITHIN 14 DAYS OF EACH OTHER UNLESS OTHERWISE ARRANGED.

DUE TO WORK COMMITMENTS I AM ONLY ABLE TO POST ONCE A WEEK.

 

WHERE POSSIBLE I USE RECYCLED PACKING MATERIALS TO SAVE ON POSTAGE AND THE ENVIRONMENT. IF YOU WOULD PREFER NEW MATERIALS THAT IS FINE BUT PLEASE LET ME KNOW BEFORE PAYING AS THIS WILL INCURE A SMALL FEE.

I AM NOT AN EXPERT COMIC GRADER.

ALL COMICS/TPBS ARE IS GOOD BUT 2ND HAND CONDITION UNLESS OTHERWISE STATED.

WHERE POSSIBLE I LIST ANY DEFECTS/DAMAGE BUT AM NOT ABLE TO CHECK EVERY PAGE.

IF YOU HAVE ANY PROBLEMS, QUESTIONS OR PLEASE CONTACT ME BEFORE LEAVING FEEDBACK AND I WILL DO WHAT I CAN TO REMEDY THE SITUATION.
